author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW LATER THIS MORNING...
summary: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW LATER THIS MORNING... As of 2:00 AM MST Wed Jun 11 the center of Cosme was located near 16.2, -114.5 with movement NE at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW LATER THIS MORNING... As of 2:00 AM MST Wed Jun 11 the center of Cosme was located near 16.2, -114.5 with movement NE at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Cosme (EP3/EP032025)
